class.name: KinematicBody1D
class.brief_description: 1D kinematic body used for characters and other animated objects.
class.description: 1D kinematic body used for characters and other animated objects.

method.name: move_and_collide
method.description: Move the body by the given amount and collide with any [StaticBody1D] or [KinematicBody1D] nodes in the way. The return value is the remainder of the movement after the collision. If the movement did not cause a collision, the return value is [code]0.0[/code].
